meta.title: simple_send
meta.description: A single script-locked input being spent with a simple datum & redeemer

meta.title: simple_spend_no_datum
meta.description: A single script-locked input spent, without any datum attached.

meta.title: mint
meta.description: A transaction minting from 2 different scripts provided unsorted in the serialised transaction

meta.title: certificates_v9
meta.description: A transaction that contains a variety of certificates, script and keys; requiring script validation for some. Only works for version 9 of the protocol.

meta.title: certificates_v10
meta.description: A transaction that contains a variety of certificates, script and keys; requiring script validation for some. Works for version 10 of the protocol onwards.

meta.title: simple_send
meta.description: A single script-locked input being spent with a simple datum & redeemer

meta.title: mint
meta.description: A transaction minting from 2 different scripts provided unsorted in the serialised transaction
